calibAmpResp

public static int calibAmpResp(double[] resp,
                               double calper,
                               double calib,
                               double freqStart,
                               double freqEnd,
                               int freqNum)
\ingroup isti_utils_public_functions \brief Function to normalize response function using calib and calper. \note Modifies the first argument.

Parameters:
resp - the response.
calper - calper calibration value from the RESP file.
calib - calib calibration value from the RESP file.
freqStart - the start frequency.
freqEnd - the end frequency.
freqNum - the number of frequencies.
Returns:
ISTI_UTIL_FAILED or ISTI_UTIL_SUCCESS.

\ingroup isti_utils_public_functions \brief Displacement to acceleration conversion for PSD

Parameters:
spectrum - the spectrum data.
deltaF - the delta.
len - the length.

len - the length.

windowHanning

public static double[] windowHanning(double[] data)
\ingroup isti_utils_public_functions \brief Function for normalizing data vector with Hanning window. \note We apply Hanning window S(n) * 1/2 [1- cos (2PI*n/N)] \note to our data to reduce leakage in PSD computation;

Parameters:
data - the data.

windowHamming

Function for normalizing data vector with Hamming window.

Parameters:
data - the data.

realDeconvolution

public static void realDeconvolution(double[] denom,
                                     double[] numer,
                                     int len)
\ingroup isti_utils_public_functions \brief Function for real numbers deconvolution of double array. \note We assume that the length of both arays are the same and save the \note output into the data. \note The output is saved in the first and second input parameters. Beware!

Parameters:
denom - the denominator array.
numer - the numerator array.
len - the length.

getNoiseSpectra

public static Spectra getNoiseSpectra(int[] trace,
                                      double sampRate,
                                      Response response,
                                      Date date,
                                      String name,
                                      boolean verboseDebug)
Builds amplitude spectra of trace. proper response function out of RESP file.

Parameters:
trace - the trace array.
numSamples - the number of samples.
sampRate - the sample rate.
verboseDebug - true for verbose debug messages
Returns:
the noise spectra.

processFft_Radix2

public static Cmplx[] processFft_Radix2(double[] indata,
                                        int n)
\ingroup sscdns_process_private_functions \brief Function for processing fft. \note See http://www.w.org/doc/fftw_2.html#SEC5 for comments on how \note fft works

Parameters:
indata - the input data, count of points must be power of 2
n - the size of the data.
Returns:
the FFT output.

Parameters:
indata - spectra to process, count of points must be power of 2
